        source -

      • addMaxMana

        public boolean addMaxMana(String key,
                 int value)
        Adds the amount of mana to the maximum amount of mana the player can have, also adds that much mana to the hero's current mana. This operation will fail if a key already exists.
        Parameters:
        key -
        value -
        Returns:
        true if operation was successfull

        Parameters:
        entity -
        reason -
        Returns:
        true - if the player is no longer in combat
